channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Weekend Betting Recap: 'The Vikings Did Us a Massive Favor There'
item.description: The public was riding high in NFL Week 15 ... until Sunday's late game. Patrick Everson breaks down how the Cowboys' loss helped books and more.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Buzz: Commanders Sidelining Jayden Daniels for Rest of Season
item.description: We're down to the final three weeks of the 2025 NFL regular season, with each bit of news across the league becoming more and more critical.

item.title: Big Ten Dominates AP All-America 1st Team, Led by OSU and Heisman-Winner Mendoza
item.description: The Associated Press has released its All-America team, featuring four Ohio State players and Heisman winner Fernando Mendoza among 10 first-team pick...

item.title: Rivers to remain Colts' QB1 for MNF vs. 49ers
item.description: Philip Rivers will remain the Colts' starting quarterback for their Week 16 "Monday Night Football" matchup with the 49ers, coach Shane Steichen said ...

item.title: MRI confirms Parsons has torn ACL, source says
item.description: An MRI confirmed that Packers star pass rusher Micah Parsons suffered a season-ending torn ACL, a source told ESPN.

item.title: Jets fire DC Wilks after blowout loss to Jaguars

item.title: Mahomes avoided major damage to rest of knee
item.description: An MRI revealed, that besides his torn ACL, Patrick Mahomes didn't have any major damage to his other ligaments in his left knee.
